articles.title: Fauci 'disturbed' about baseline of Covid-19 cases in US - CNN
articles.description: As New York City closes some schools again, National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases Director Dr. Anthony Fauci says he is "disturbed and concerned" about the baseline of coronavirus cases in the US. CNN's Nick Watt reports.

articles.description: Aerosols lingering in the air could be a major source of COVID-19 transmission, a group of U.S. scientists warned in an unrelated open letter published in medical journal Science on Monday.
